page.title: 17WILDEN'S MAY DAY FAYRE.
page.content: This year was our 7th May Day. Started by the school, it has grown into the major village event, raising over Â£2000 each year. Preparations begin months before with committee meetings to decide programme etc. Rehearsals begin for Maypole Dancing,Queen & Attendants chosen, stall holders selected, VIP's invited. The Day arrives.Dancers visit every house with a sprig of may. Stalls and maypole are erected. Helpers arrive, loudspeakers, produce, sideshows. Organised chaos. Anxious looks at weather. 1.30pm. First arrivals. Car park fills. Queen and procession assemble on Village Green.VIP arrives. Queen is duly crowned. Stalls declared open. Dancers in traditional costume, perform. School children dressed as jesters, sweeps, greenman entertain. And the sun shines!
